title: I unlocked a ward with orange essence and its not in my options to equip it.
body: Unlocked it took my essence and disappeared, not sure what to do.{{champion:63}}

replies.body: Hey I looked into this for you and it looks like the Conqueror ward was disenchanted, not unlocked. >.<  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), we'll see if we can find some options for you!
